Code.Name: Business rule violation, fatal
Code.Description: Error associated with a business rule that indicates a problem that leads to the rejection of the referenced message.

Code.Name: Business rule violation, warning
Code.Description: Warning related to a business rule that indicates a problem but that does not hinder further processing at this point in time.

Code.Name: Syntax violation
Code.Description: Error associated with a syntax violation that indicates a problem that leads to the rejection of the referenced message.

Code.Name: Reference not found
Code.Description: Error caused by a document reference given in the received message that could not be found. Leads to the rejection of the received message.

Code.Name: Deadline expired
Code.Description: Error caused by a received message that was not submitted on time. Depending on the procedure availability and elapsed time period, the message may be rejected or conditionally accepted as a result.

Code.Name: Request failed
Code.Description: Error caused by a received message that cannot be processed further for technical reasons. Leads to rejection of the received message.

Code.Name: Wrong transaction flow
Code.Description: Error caused to a received message that was not sent in the expected sequence of the business process. Leads to the rejection of the received message.

Code.Name: Invalid request
Code.Description: Error caused by a received message that cannot be processed further for semantic or business reasons. The message may be rejected or conditionally accepted as a result.

Code.Name: Missing authorisation
Code.Description: Error caused by a received message that could not be processed further due to a missing authorization or approval for the prodecure. Leads to the rejection of the received message.

Code.Name: Authentication exception
Code.Description: Error caused by a received message that could not be processed further due missing authentication or registration for the procedure. Leads to the rejection of the received message.

Code.Name: Process termination
Code.Description: A query response of a Search Notice Request is cancelled or terminated.
